name: Chit Chat
description:
Chit Chat is a conversation simulation / point and click game. By downloading, you will be granted access to our groundbreaking test facility, in which you will get to learn about how to talk to some of our most interesting employees! They are very new, as our last ones were sadly murdered laid off. 

Included:

  • Cute and Lovable characters!
  • A  Fun Mini Game!
  • Explosions!
  • Only Takes 10 Minutes!
  • Murder!
  • Juicy Buttons!
  • Difficult Choices!
  • Judgement!
  • And So Much More!

Chit Chat was a game made for the A Game By It's Cover 2020 game jam! The theme was 'Low Tech', and the cartridge art I chose from the Famicase Exhibition was Chit Chat. I had a lot of fun making this game, and hope you will enjoy playing it as well! This is my first game jam game, and I plan on doing more game jams very soon. Thank you for the support!

Game Engine: Unity

Sound: bfxr

Music: Bosca Ceoil
